column2: Use the control console to reprogram the golems to fight the fires.

Guesting is a free feature that enables players on one world to play with their friends on another world. With Guesting, your characters can play on any world you have friends on, with some restrictions. You will not be able to participate in world vs. world while Guesting. 

Guesting is not available at this time.

<c=@flavor>A gift given in gratitude from the leaders of Tyria.</c>

<c=@flavor>The first seed cultivated and produced by your own hand. To cultivate this new specimen to be even better than the last, plant in a Chaos Infused Clay Pot to germinate.</c>

A humming emanates from this orb. It could be amplified with an additional source of Chaotic Radiation.

An inert pile of dust from a ley line. A jolt of energy from a specialized asuran lab will energize it.

<c=@flavor>The waters of the Maguuma Jungle are famous for having inherent healing powers.</c>

<c=@flavor>The next generation of cultivated seed produced by your own hand. To cultivate this new specimen to be even better than the last, plant it in a Mists Infused Clay Pot to germinate.</c>

<c=@flavor>A stone taken from the Mists, steeped in its power.</c>

<c=@flavor>The Font of Rhand is known to be a very magical place.</c>

<c=@flavor>Every crack in its container glows from the light within.</c>
<c=@flavor>A simple heat stone isn't quite enough to channel the sweltering temperatures of the deep Maguuma Jungle.</c>

Combine in the Mystic Forge with a Heat Stone, Bloodstone Bricks, and a +5 Agony Infusion to create a Destroyer Heated Stone.

<c=@flavor>A steaming hot stone from the core of a powerful Destroyer.</c>

I owe you much, adventurer. Not only did you recover Snow Leopard's shrine from the Sons of Svanir, you also found evidence that they killed the shrine's shaman. I saw that they paid for their treachery, but the Svanir won't stop. As long as they worship Dragon, no shrine of the Spirits is safe. Take care, and stay vigilant.

—Toka

Things were getting dicey at my family's lodge, but you did us a great favor—you kept the Sons of Svanir at bay, and our lodge safe. My patrons are singing of your heroics. I wouldn't have believed snowmen could ward off men as wicked as the Sons, but with armor, those snow mounds were fearsome to behold. My lodge is always open to you, %str1%.

—Travelen

My tribe is in your debt. You fought the Sons of Svanir alongside our mightiest grawl warriors, and drove the Svanir away from my people's home. In time, the land will heal. In time, the Svanir will return. This cycle will repeat, but with allies like you, we may win yet.

—Mokooki

Drakkitoka and skritt of Ratatosk thank tall, strong, and stompy %str1%, for spider squishings. Now, very few spiders left, and they leave us alone! No more scratchy bites, no more sticky webs. Our tunnels are open to you, always. We put shinies in this letter—take them, all for you! Yes! Bye-bye!

—Drakkitoka
Double-click to salvage crafting materials from an item in your inventory. 25%% chance of rarer materials. 80%% chance of salvaging upgrades.

Salutations!

Word of your exploits continues to spread far and wide. No matter where you travel, you embrace those around you and help them in their times of need. Lornar's Pass has long been a challenge for travelers and adventurers alike, but you overcame all its unique trials with ease.

But as your forays into the unfamiliar expand, be aware that the dangers will likely increase as well. It has been said that the most enduring legends are built upon foundations of danger.

Keep up the good work.

—Tyrian Explorers Society
Control capture points to gain score for your team, first team to a score of 500 wins. Kill neutral NPC's for 50 points and powerful buffs!
Control the 3 capture points and defeat enemies to earn score for your team. Operate your team's trebuchet to bombard foes.
This is your current World vs. World title and will be what enemies see you as. Gain world ranks to acquire new titles.
Your world rank progression. Each new rank gives you a World Ability Point and potentially a new world title. Enemies in WvW can see your world title.
Bonus chests are awarded for every world rank achieved prior to the existence of the chests. You will gain one bonus chest every time a new world rank is gained until all chests have been awarded.
Increases area of marks and marks become unblockable.

To: %str1%:
From: Scholar Olenn

Your assistance with the grawl was most appreciated. Those pea-brained mongrels are still gadding about the Searing Crystal, but I took the upmost delight in watching you deal with them.

So, thank you for that.

—Scholar Olenn
